tha-ap396:18.2: Sampupphite → supupphite (sya1ed, sya2ed) | samphīte (pts-vp-pli1ed), sañchanne → vappadese (sya1ed, sya2ed) | ca chappade (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap396:19.1: Majjhe mahante hīne ca → majjhe mayhaṃ bhavā assu (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
tha-ap396:19.2: bhave sabbe atikkamiṃ → ye bhave samatikkamiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | yo bhavesu pakittayi (mr)
